scene.text: Everyone abandons their past in the process of their lives.

text.p: As we grow older, we gradually leave our mother’s womb and breasts, the warm and comfortable cradle, leave the place where we were raised, and eventually we become a person with no semblance of our past selves.
It was this series of betrayals that made the man named “Napoleon Bonaparte” finally become the version written in history.

scene.text: He had long gotten accustomed to being betrayed, and was even proud of it.
No matter what the situation is… as long as there was a chance for a comeback, he would definitely continue to move forward.
--The word “failure” was never in his dictionary.
In previous wars, limited by equipment, supplies, morale and luck, he also had to helplessly surrender, and was afraid that a comeback would not be possible.
However, all of that, to this day, is nothing more than history he has long trampled on.
He was defeated by the Russian “General Winter”, and the enemy’s coalition commander drove straight and directly occupied Paris.
But in the blink of an eye, he sneaked out of Elba Island and went back to his homeland, with all of Bourbon's army turning to his side.
However, the subsequent battle of Waterloo brought the Hundred Days to a hasty end. He was punished with exile for the second time, now to the distant South Atlantic Ocean--

But just when everyone thought that the Emperor’s life would not bring any new upheavals, he who was in his twilight years, was involved in the experiments of the “Snake” and sent to another world by mistake. He regained his throne.

However, his life that should have been smooth sailing was corrupted by greed: In order to permanently master this mighty power, he tried to activate the ancient civilization’s device to control this microverse.
...Therefore turning all of his subjects into inhuman existences.
But even so, the emperor did not give up.
After a brief period of grief, he realized that this was just the beginning of a greater journey--
He and his surviving subjects had just transformed from a lifeform that “consumes chemical energy” into another liforme that “consumes Honkai Energy”.
The position of emperor remains solid. The empire's military power was better than ever.
After a brief dispute, the subjects of today became single-hearted, with a sincerity more enthusiastic and majestic than the previous “Era of Hymns”
Although the new subjects needed a “Wall” to gradually transform the land under their feet - But to the emperor, this slow but sure expansion brought a different kind of calmness.
Which is why, currently the emperor can be said to be extremely angry.
He originally thought that, as the world gradually turned into one more suitable for his people’s lives, his enemies would only become weaker and less aggressive--
However, those ants that only stay in their nest, the Girondin-like mobs, the stupid humans incapable of accepting the new form of life…
They were able to disintegrate part of the world. They were able to destroy the sacred and energy filled territory of his empire.
They were able to push the emperor into despair without losing a single soldier.
...But that did not waver the emperor.
He had lived for so long, that this was just a new form of “despair”.
The enemy seemed to believe that the foundation of the empire’s existence was its sacred territory.
“Without a land, a country cannot exist” - Usually, that would be true.
However, thanks to the barrier of the “wall”, they could not infer that…
...The emperor and his subjects had already become inseparable, and even if they were scattered in the void, there is still a way to preserve the core functions.
The empire was built upon the principle of the “new life”.
It would eventually break out of its cocoon and become a butterfly, breaking through the cage called “the world”.
There will be no disease, no discrimiation, no poverty, and no death.
--And after that, an absolute understanding and absolute freedom.
They will reach the resurrection promised by the prophet to the people, and they will bring judgement to all lower lifeforms.
As of now, it is a creature that is both the emperor and his subjects. The only thing it did not understand is…
...Why this blazing power, until today, had not been inherited and carried forward by anyone?
After all, the source of this power was not “Napoleon Bonaparte” or any wise man from his era-
This power originated from a secret from tens of thousands of years in the past. It is like a rising sun in the eclipse, unfortunately dying before it could give off light.
However, it had to wait for nightfall before it could shine majestically on the other side of the shore.
...It discarded all forms of impurity, leaving only the strongest, simplest, and most original part of life.
No language, no beauty. Just its existence was a symbol of truth.
--This is undoubtedly the ultimate lifeform.
Those who try to kill it in the cradle will only be humiliated in the face of this force.
What’s more, the opponent’s formation was too dependent on the “pipes” of this world--
--In the eyes of the emperor, the opponent had lost from the start.
...The smell of blood was permeating the battlefield.
The soldier’s bodies filled every nearby gully like sandbags being piled to prevent a flood.
However, the temporary commander-in-chief was unable to order a retreat.
The enemy landed from the sky, occupying the main entrance to the Anchor Point and cutting off everyone’s retreat.
Therefore, as long as these commanders did not plan on leaving their soldiers to escape first-
--They must choose for everyone, including themselves, to either “charge at the enemy” or “wait to die”.
The enemy is firmly on their throats. The passage of the Anchor Point is easy to defend but difficult to attack.
Bringing troops from the other side of the Bubble Universe will only cause them to be wiped out by this weird enemy before they can even get into formation.
...At this moment, on this North Sea island, they can only fight alone.
At first, when the gate-shaped monster appeared on the starry sky, the soldiers were optimistic that it was just some kind of residue from the cutting of the world--
--It might be a leftover mechanical device, or an enemy that is only strong in groups.
然而，当拦截无效、炮击无效，对方稳如山巅之城一般降落在锚点入口并施放出无数触腕的时候……
……任谁都能明白，挡在他们面前的，绝非普通的存在。
共和国的士兵们作战得很英勇。
他们前仆后继，只为了给同伴争取足够的时间。
新婚者、初为父母者、独子、年轻人……
滞留在这北海孤岛上的兵团，正在按照这样的顺序，使用仍在他们控制之下的备用通道，一个、一个地疏散着自己的战友。
如果用信息通量来对比，这备用的锚点通道的“带宽”只有主通道的万分之一左右——
这意味着前线的士兵坚持一个小时，也只能换来大约二十名同伴的成功撤退。
——而今天，为了完美实施切割世界泡的计划，在这座不大的北海岛屿上，集中了将近三千名共和国最精锐的战士。
……也就是说，即使前线士兵们能够一直支撑下去，他们也需要一周的时间才能从岛上完全撤离。
的确，他们还有“喀里多尼亚号”可以从水下穿越这个世界独有的狂风巨浪——
但是这唯一的额外手段，满打满算，也只能每两天转移走五十个幸运儿罢了。

scene.speak: ——比安卡和圣剑在之前的行动中都消耗了太多的能量，即使有丽塔的照顾，她们似乎也很难在短时间内苏醒。
你麾下的星语者们，甚至是“喀里多尼亚号”的船员们，凡是自认能够在战场上存活下来的家伙，都已经冲上了前线。
他们每个人都很英勇……但是他们自己或许最为明白——
——他们只不过是在打一场必输无疑的战斗。
……所以呢？
如果你有什么能够扭转局面的方法，那就不要在这里绕弯子了。
有话直说。
我想……如果十天前我向薛定谔咨询过的事情确实成立，那么我的确有办法杀死那个门——
——但是我需要你命令所有人都退出战场。
……你说什么？撤退？退出战线？
你疯了吗？我们现在可是背水一战，你让我往哪里退？
——难道要放弃这一片仅有的防御阵地，直接退到你的指挥部去吗？
你这样才是真正的军事自杀，你知道吗？
……不要慌张，瓦拉几亚人。
议长命令你们后撤是有原因的——
——因为接下来，会由我来负责消灭这个敌人。
……你？一个考古学家？
你难道靠换了一身衣服就说服她们了吗？
……你究竟打算做什么？
首先，我要向你们道歉——
因为我在你们面前一直使用的“商博良”这个名字，其实只是从某个后辈同胞那里借来的而已。
重新自我介绍一下吧，顽强的战士们、英勇的军人们——
我的名字是“拿破仑”，我的姓氏是“波拿巴”——我来自科西嘉岛。
我并不是普通的“星语者”；我是被你们眼前的怪物，在它二十五岁时就断然抛弃了的“普通人的人生”——
——是无数早已被它遗忘的“背叛”中，那最初、也是最本源的成分。
借用备用通道、通过锚点调整之后，我已经回到了被这个怪物所抛弃时的最初状态，并刻意让身体结构的虚数极性完全反转。
简单来说，此时此刻，你们面前的这个怪物伤不到我的一丝一毫——
——而我，却可以通过简单的接触，就能将它彻底摧毁。
如果真有这么方便的事情，你为什么现在才站出来？！
……你知道我们已经牺牲了多少人吗？！
……对不起。
让大家在此承受了如此惨重的牺牲……我的确很过意不去。
但是，不论目的为何……如果说一个人要主动舍弃自己的生命——
——我想，她终究还是要进行一番内心的挣扎吧。
你是要和它同归于尽吗？！
……确切地说，只不过是让它为我“陪葬”而已。
调整全身物理结构的虚数极性——这件事本身，就是百分之百的自杀行为。
我现在只不过是一具服下了砒霜的行尸走肉——
——只不过是想为自己找一个稍显荣耀的葬身之地罢了。
……与我一样同为“拿破仑·波拿巴”的存在啊。
你现在是否因为我的出现而感受到羞辱？
你现在是否因为我的出现而突然恐惧？
在漫长一生中不断否定自我的你，却反过来要被自身的过去否定——
——已经统合了全体臣民、失去了语言器官的你，此时此刻，是否尤其觉得羞愤难当呢？
又或者，你正忙于重新启动自己那笨重的躯体，试图躲避这一步步正向你抵近的死亡呢？
……呵。没什么，对我来说，这些都不重要。
我只希望你能够知道——
你走上了如此不堪的一条歧路——
以至于你的历史、你的初心、你最初的梦想——
——它们宁愿用自己的死亡，来换取你的毁灭。
……比安卡。
当你重握圣剑的时候，或许会因为此时此刻的事而有些感伤。
我们是同行的伙伴，是为了拯救世界而不断探索的冒险者；
但今天，这世界却也因为我行动的迟缓，而承受了许多不必要的痛苦。
可是，话说回来——
如果是你的话——
你一定会更加高昂起头，按照你一贯的步调，用更坚定的步伐继续前进吧？
因为你知道，只有这样，那些不完美的故事才可能会变得完美——
那些不完美的世界，才可能拥有一个大家更期待的明天。
比安卡……还有永远都陪伴在你身边的丽塔……
……我说的，没错吧？
